title: Bloomberg Markets: Gurlé on  Funding for Cloud-Based Messaging
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Gurlé on  Funding for Cloud-Based Messaging
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Gurlé Chief Executive Officer Symphony Discussing new funding for the cloud-based messaging and collaboration platform that is powered by an open and growing app ecosystem, and protected with customer-owned encryption keys.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
